misc.pingpong:
El prefijo del bot es `{0}` y el comando de ayuda `{0}ayuda`
Si necesitas soporte, abre un ticket en <#832033137742708737>
cooldown_msgs: Tienes que esperar **{}** antes de hacerlo nuevamente.

errors.andioop: ¡Vaya! Algo salió muy mal, reporta el error abriendo un ticket en <#832033137742708737>
errors.private: Este comando no puede ser utilizado en mensajes privados.
errors.bot_perms: (Yo, el bot) ¡No tengo permisos para hacer esto!
errors.concurrency: Estás utilizando ese comando demasiado rápido.
errors.missing_arg: ¡Parece que te falta un argumento! Utiliza `!ayuda <comando>`
errors.bad_arg: ¡Parece que hay un argumento érroneo! Utiliza `!ayuda <comando>`
errors.not_ready: El bot todavía se está iniciando.
errors.nrn_buddy: No puedes utilizar este comando ahora mismo.

body: ¡Gracias por agregarme! Utiliza `{prefix}ayuda` para comenzar con el bot.
If you need any more help, check out the **[Support Server]({support_server})**!
intro.footer: Bot oficial de la comunidad CHIRUSXS ({prefix}créditos)  |  Revisa las {prefix}reglasbot

main.desc:
¿Necesitas más ayuda? Abre un ticket en <#832033137742708737>
¿Alguna sugerencia? Realizala con el comando `>suggest` en <#747222697225748551>
main.howto: Utiliza `{0}ayuda <command>` para aprender a usar un comando
main.nodoc: No hay ayuda para mostrar de ese comando.

econ.perfil: `{0}perfil [miembro]` Muestra tu perfil o el de alguien más
econ.saldo: `{0}saldo [miembro]` Muestra tu saldo o el de alguien más
econ.inventario:
`{0}inventario [categoría] [miembro]` Muestra tu inventario o el de alguien más
Categorías: `herramientas`, `magia`, `pesca`, u `otros`
econ.dar: `{0}dar <miembro> <cantidad> <objeto>` Da objetos o esmeraldas a alguien más
econ.agricultura: `{0}agricultura` Planta y cosecha todo tipo de cultivos
econ.comprar: `{0}comprar [cantidad] <objeto>` Compra un objeto de la tienda

mc.servidor: `{0}servidor` Revisa el estado del servidor de Minecraft
mc.idea: `{0}idea` Envía una idea para construir algo

util.ayuda: `{0}ayuda` Revisa el menú de ayuda del bot
util.config: `{0}config` Configura el bot a tu gusto
util.ping: `{0}ping` Muestra la latencia entre Discord y el bot
util.infoservidor: `{0}infoservidor` Revisa información del servidor de Discord
util.avatar: `{0}avatar [miembro]` Muestra tu avatar o el de alguien más

fun.cursed: `{0}cursed` Envía una imagen cursed de Minecraft
fun.encantar: `{0}encantar <texto>` Traduce texto al idioma de mesa de encantamientos
fun.desencantar: `{0}desencantar <texto>` Traduce texto en idioma de mesa de encantamientos a letras
fun.traductoraldeano: `{0}traductoraldeano <texto>` Traduce texto a sonidos de aldeano

mod.warn: `{0}warn <user> [optional: reason]` *warn a user for a specified reason*
mod.warns: `{0}warns <user>` *view the warns a user has, leave blank to see your warnings*
mod.delwarns: `{0}delwarns <user>` *clears the warns that user has in this server*
mod.kick: `{0}kick <user> [optional: reason]` *kicks the user from the current Discord server*
mod.ban: `{0}ban <user> [optional: delete message days] [optional: reason]` *bans the user from the current Discord server*
mod.pardon: `{0}pardon <user>` *unban the user from the current Discord server*
mod.mute: `{0}mute <user> [time] [reason]` *mutes the user in the current Discord server*
mod.unmute: `{0}unmute <user>` *unmutes the user in the current Discord server*

fun.too_long: Ese mensaje es demasiado largo para convertir.

bubblewrap.invalid_size_1: That is not a valid size. Example of a valid size: `10x10`
bubblewrap.invalid_size_2: The size must be between 1 and 12

trivia.title: {}  Trivia de Minecraft **[{}]** {}
trivia.timeout: Vaya... Te has quedado sin tiempo.

questions.q: How much health does the Ender Dragon have?
How many slices does a Minecraft cake have?
How much hunger does a potato restore?
How much hunger saturation does a potato restore?
What food restores the most hunger in Minecraft?
How much XP does a villager need to get from Novice to Master rank?
What's the rarest biome in Minecraft?
What year was Minecraft fully released?
What mob are creepers scared of?
In what snapshot were elytra added to the game?
What does the skeleton use to attack?
What does the wither skeleton use to attack?
How far away is the world border from 0 0?
a: There is no border, Minecraft is infinite

questions.q: In which trade slot does the shepherd villager sell beds?
What tool is sold by both the toolsmith and weaponsmith villagers?

Who originally created Minecraft?

**true** or **false**: Minecraft skeletons can break down doors
What was the first enemy introduced into Minecraft?
Which hostile mob was added in the Pretty Scary Update?
Which enemy was introduced in Minecraft 1.8?
In which snapshot was the Zombie Pigman renamed to the Zombified Piglin?
What's the ingredient used to make lingering potions?
What year did development on Minecraft begin?
In what programming language is the PC version of Minecraft written in?
How many minutes does it take for a baby villager to grow up?
How many different colors of dye are there?
What enchantment has the same max level as Sharpness?
What's the Ender Dragon's name?
Why did polar bears get added to Minecraft?
a: Jeb's wife liked polar bears so he added it
the community chose it on Minecon live
Notch added it as a secret friday update
the community voted for it on Twitter

questions.q: What language do Enderman speak?
What's the most common flower in the swamp biome?
Why was the black and white cat added to the game?
a: Jeb's cat died and it looked that way
Notch liked the way it looked
they googled random cat images and found that one

questions.q: How is the "How did we get here?" achievement obtained?
a: having all effects applied at once
having all potion effects applied at once
by going to an end city

questions.q: **true** or **false**: piglins only attack when you hit them
Giving a sheep what nametag will make them become rainbow?
What was the creeper supposed to be originally?
**true** or **false**: the Ender Dragon can only lay multiple eggs
Which update was also known as "The Pretty Scary Update"?
Which nametag will turn a mob upside-down?
What three items are required to get an active conduit?
a: corazón del mar, nautilus shell, any type of prismarine
corazón del mar, beacon, any type of prismarine
corazón del mar, nautilus shell, glass

questions.q: What is the base increase for melee damage when the strength effect is applied?
All Minecraft cows are...
What is the maximum number of melon slices a melon can drop?
How much wool do you need to make a bed in Minecraft?
What item do slimes drop in Minecraft?
What is the name of the mob that drops magma cream?
What is the name of the mob that drops gunpowder?
**true** or **false**: in Minecraft, fish can drop bones
What is the rarest type of axolotl?
**true** or **false**: in Minecraft, axolotls can only spawn in absolute darkness
Which of the following is actually a type of axolotl in Minecraft?
How do you breed axolotls in Minecraft?
How do you breed cows in Minecraft?
How do you breed sheep in Minecraft?
How do you breed chickens in Minecraft?
How do you breed pigs in Minecraft?
**true** or **false**: you can milk mushroom stew from mooshrooms
**true** or **false**: you can milk mushroom stew from cows with a bowl
**true** or **false**: the Minecraft bedrock edition is coded in the Java programming language
What programming language is Minecraft Bedrock Edition coded in?
What's the world format for Minecraft Bedrock Edition called?
What's the world format for Minecraft Java Edition called?
How big in blocks is a cubic chunk in Minecraft?
How big in chunks is a region in Minecraft?
**true** or **false**: the text in the enchantment table is just gibberish
What can you wear to stop enderman from attacking you if you look at their eyes?
How is a charged creeper created?
a: It's crafted with a nether star
It gets hit by a flying wither skull
It's spawned in with the debug stick

questions.q: What animal was recorded to make the sound effects for the ghast?

**true** or **false**: Minecraft bees can swim underwater
What debuff do elder guardians inflict in Minecraft?
How do you turn a villager into a witch?
a: have a zombie bite the villager

**true** or **false**: you can heal iron golems with iron ingots

config.invalid: Esa no es una opción válida. Prueba con: {}

main.title: Chiru Aldeano - Opciones
guild_content:
`{0}config prefijo <prefijo>` - Change the command prefix in this server.

`{0}config respuestas <on/off>` - Change if bot should respond to messages like "emeralds".

`{0}config dificultad <pacífico/fácil/díficil>` - Changes the difficulty of the game.

`{0}config idioma <idioma>` - Changes the language of Villager Bot.

`{0}config servidorminecraft <ip>` - Changes the server that is pinged if you don't specify a server in `/mcping`.

`{0}config alternarcomando <comando>` - Change whether the specified command can be used or not.
user_content: `{0}config alertaregalo <on/off>` - Change whether bot tells you if you've been given items or emeralds.

prefix.error_1: El prefijo no puede superar los `{}` caracteres.
prefix.error_2: El carácter `{}` no puede ser utilizado como prefijo.
prefix.set: Se estableció el prefijo del servidor en `{}`

rules.penalty: El romper estas reglas puede implicar ser vetado/a temporal o permanentemente del bot o recibir un reinicio de estadísticas.
rules.rule_1: **1.** No abuses de ni divulges públicamente bugs o errores, reportalos abriendo un ticket en <#832033137742708737>
rules.rule_2: **2.** No hagas trampas de ninguna manera, ya sea con multiples cuentas o con automatizaciones
rules.rule_3: **3.** No utilices el bot para molestar, irrespetar o humillar a alguien más.
rules.rule_4: **4.** No desvirtues el uso del bot.

remind.reminder_max: You cannot have more than {max} reminders at once.
remind.stupid_1: You used invalid formatting, example: `{0}remindme 1w2d3h4m this is an example` will remind you in one week, two days, three hours, and four minutes.
remind.time_max: You cannot set a reminder more than eight weeks in advance.
remind.reminder: {0}, you wanted me to remind you: *{1}*
